description: a(n) = floor(a(n-1)/2) if this is not among 0,a(1),...,a(n-1), else a(n) = a(n-1)+a(n-2).
links: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Nest[Append[#, If[MemberQ[Append[#, 0], r = Quotient[#[[-1]], 2]], #[[-1]] + #[[-2]], r]] &, {1, 1}, 59] (* _Ivan Neretin_, Mar 02 2016 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
